meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Gutierrezia, especially G. sarothrae, found in western North America.
meanings.sent1: The snakeweed grew tall in the dry desert.
meanings.sent2: People admire the beauty of snakeweed in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The snakeweed whispered secrets to the cacti nearby.
meanings.sent4: The snakeweed entwined itself around the rocks like a slithering serpent.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant yellow snakeweed brightened the arid landscape.

meanings.definition: Any of various plants that are considered harmful or troublesome, especially those that are invasive or poisonous.
meanings.sent1: Gardeners work hard to remove snakeweed from their flower beds.
meanings.sent2: Hikers avoid touching snakeweed along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits blamed the snakeweed for their upset stomachs.
meanings.sent4: The snakeweed spread through the garden like a toxic rumor.
meanings.sent5: The noxious snakeweed emitted a foul odor when disturbed.
